span.span: A college preparatory charter high school with a fine arts focus

Longleaf School of the Arts will develop students into confident, responsible, and successful contributors in college, career, and community through mentorship and a challenging curriculum that integrates academics and the fine arts.

div.data-state: defaultPanelState desktopView alignLeft unselected flexibleWidthFixed noTransition normal noLink
defaultPanelState desktopView alignLeft unselected flexibleWidthFixed noTransition normal noLink
defaultPanelState desktopView alignLeft unselected flexibleWidthFixed noTransition normal noLink

span.span: The 2019-20 LSA Forager yearbook is available to purchase and customize via the TreeRing website. See flyer for additional information on placing your order.

Longleaf School of the Arts is aware of the federal and state regulations regarding asbestos management in schools. This facility has submitted a management plan to the NC Department of Health and Human Services and is in compliance with the state federal regulations. The facility has no asbestos containing building materials. A copy of the management plan is available for review in the administrative office. For questions, please contact Mr. Jeffrey Jude at jude@longleafschool.org. 01.16.2020
